note.title: Conjure Animals
note.text:
The following creatures are valid targets for the spell Conjure Animals:
CR 1/4 or Lower • Axe Beak • Baboon • Badger • Bat • Blood Hawk • Boar • Camel • Cat • Constrictor Snake • Crab • Deer • Draft Horse • Eagle • Elk • Flying Snake • Frog • Giant Badger • Giant Bat • Giant Centipede • Giant Crab • Giant Fire Beetle • Giant Fly (Dungeon Master's Guide) • Giant Frog • Giant Lizard • Giant Owl • Giant Poisonous Snake • Giant Rat • Giant Rat (Diseased) • Giant Weasel • Giant Wolf Spider • Goat • Hawk • Hyena • Jackal • Lizard • Mastiff • Mule • Octopus • Owl • Panther • Poisonous Snake • Pony • Pteranodon • Quipper • Rat • Raven • Riding Horse • Scorpion • Sea Horse • Spider • Steeder Male (Out of the Abyss) • Stirge • Tressym (Storm King's Thunder) • Vulture • Weasel • Wolf
CR 1/2: • Ape • Black Bear • Crocodile • Giant Goat • Giant Sea Horse • Giant Wasp • Reef Shark • Warhorse
CR 1: • Brown Bear • Crag Cat (Storm King's Thunder) • Dire Wolf • Giant Eagle • Giant Hyena • Giant Octopus • Giant Spider • Giant Toad • Giant Vulture • Lion • Steeder Female (Out of the Abyss) • Tiger
CR 2: • Allosaurus • Cave Bear • Giant Boar • Giant Constrictor Snake • Giant Elk • Hunter Shark • Plesiosaurus • Polar Bear • Rhinoceros • Saber-Toothed Tiger
